oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sallie M. Conner correspondence with Penelope Johnson Allen, 1933 October 27
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Conner, Sallie M.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter to Mrs. Penelope J. Allen from Sallie M. Conner detailing the Conner family tree to her in order to establish her family connection with the Brainerd Mission. Connor describes her family's connection to John Vail and the exhumation of Samuel Worcester.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Cherokee Indians -- History; Cherokee Indians -- Missions; Missionaries
Vail, John, 1778-1862; Worcester, S. A. (Samuel Austin), 1798-1859
American Board of Commissioners for Foreign Missions; Brainerd Mission
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Brainerd Mission Cemetery correspondence and research notes, 1896-1964
Brainerd Mission research notes, correspondence, and other material, 1896-1990
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Penelope Johnson Allen Brainerd Mission correspondence and photographs
